item.title: ‘Major Anomaly’ Behind Latest SpaceX Starship Explosion
item.description: SpaceX CEO Elon Musk suggested on X that a high-pressure nitrogen tank failure was behind the explosion of the company's massive Starship rocket.

item.title: 3 Best Thermal Brush, Tested and Reviewed by WIRED (2025)
item.description: Curious about the best thermal brush? Here’s what they can and can’t do for your hair, and which ones are worth buying.

item.title: Meta's Oakley Smart Glasses Have 3K Video—Watch Out, Ray-Ban
item.description: The new Oakley Meta glasses outshine the Ray-Ban Meta with a big jump in battery life and video quality. And there’s supposedly even more to come.

item.title: Gigabyte Radeon RX 9060 XT Review: Great Value Gaming
item.description: AMD's latest GPU is the budget PC gaming card to beat.
